channel.title: Comments on: Yahoo! Pipes – What A Great Idea
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: I remember. It was a good idea, and I believe with all the personal homepages out there it's becoming a reality. Pipes is also great because you can share the customized content with others.
item.content:encoded: I remember. It was a good idea, and I believe with all the personal homepages out there it’s becoming a reality. Pipes is also great because you can share the customized content with others.

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description: Several years ago I came to with the idea that we should create a template that every user would fill out once and all the web pages he logs into will adjust accordingly. Remember? Seems somewhat similar...
item.content:encoded: Several years ago I came to with the idea that we should create a template that every user would fill out once and all the web pages he logs into will adjust accordingly. Remember? Seems somewhat similar…
